# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="a9a75-102">如何：从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中移除自动生成的列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a9a75-103">当您的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 控件设置为基于数据源中的数据自动生成列时，您可以有选择地省略某些列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-104">可以通过对 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 集合调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> 方法来执行此操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-105">或者，您可以通过将 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> 属性设置为 `false`来隐藏视图中的列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-106">如果希望在某些情况下显示隐藏的列，或者需要访问列中的数据而不显示列，此方法非常有用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="a9a75-107">删除自动生成的列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-108">对 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 集合调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> 方法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="a9a75-109">隐藏自动生成的列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-110">将列的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> 属性设置为 `false`。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="a9a75-112">编译代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-113">此示例需要：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-114">一个名为 `dataGridView1` 的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 控件，该控件绑定到一个表，该表包含 `Fax` 和 `CustomerID` 列，如 Northwind 示例数据库中的 `Customers` 表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a9a75-115">对 <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> 程序集的引用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a9a75-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
